normalization_plan: Remove the '有否向警方舉報事件' and 'Incident Being or Not Reported to Police' columns as they are not needed.
Keep the '類別' and 'Category' columns as 'category_zh' and 'category_en' respectively.
Split the '項目' and 'Item' columns into 'item_type_zh', 'item_gender_zh' and 'item_type_en', 'item_gender_en' respectively.
Keep the '個案數字/No. of Cases' column as 'cases'.
